summary.description:
Transcriptomic Profiling of Skeletal Muscle Adaptations to Exercise and Inactivity.

Transcriptomics meta-analysis of skeletal muscle response to exercise.

Transcriptomics meta-analysis of skeletal muscle response to exercise. The shiny app is available at www.metamex.eu.

||| CORRECT NAME OF TOOL COULD ALSO BE 'muscle transcriptome exercise', 'meta-analysis MetaMEx'
summary.name: MetaMEx
